title: A surface sulfurization strategy for tuning the lithiophilicity of garnet electrolyte pellets towards advanced solid-state lithium metal electrolyte
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4335-4343
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00784K, Paper
Genxi Yu, Youchun Wu, Dawei Sha, Jianwen Cai, Gaofa Nie, Yaping Wang, Long Pan, ZhengMing Sun
A surface chemistry strategy of rapid vulcanization treatment for the garnet electrolyte enables solid-state batteries with good electrochemical performance.
